At the same time, the young senator's doggedness has prompted grumbling that she is an overly zealous self-promoter. Funny how people tend to say that about young women who actually want to achieve success in society, muses Howard Wolfson , a strategist on Kirsten Gillibrand 's 2006 campaign. Carmelo Anthony and LeBron James were the headliners, but Allen Iverson and JR Josh Smith stole the show. Allen Iverson scored a season-high 37 points and Josh Smith added 29 to help the Denver Nuggets beat the James Cleveland Cavaliers 122-100 on Monday night. They didn't steal my spotlight, said Carmelo Anthony , who had 22 points and nine rebounds.`` They did what they were supposed to do. They took advantage of the defense that they threw at us.''
